name: @expo/metro-swc-transformer
description: ðŸš‡ Base SWC transformer for Metro.

scripts.prepare-release: test -d build && rm -rf src.real && mv src src.real && mv build src
scripts.cleanup-release: test ! -e build && mv src build && mv src.real src
scripts.cargo-build: rm metro-swc-transformer-addon.node || : && cargo build --release && cp target/release/libmetro_swc_transformer.dylib metro-swc-transformer-addon.node
